item.description:
David Craft, author and local wild foods enthusiast, will lead this walk and introduce us to many edible wild plants along the way. 

David Craft will lead this foray on finding edible plants. There are over 50 tasty plants living
amongst us that we walk by every day. Picked from the right spots, and
at the right time, these plants can add significantly to the culinary
variety and to the health of your diet.  Prepared samples will be
provided. We will also do plenty of snacking right in the field.

David Craft is an urban forager living in Cambridge MA. He works as a
research scientist in radiation oncology at Mass General Hospital. His
book, Urban Foraging, is available at the Harvard Book Store and online
at amazon.com.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in the parking area beside the community gardens
item.name: Edible Wild Plant/Mushroom Walk with author David Craft
